result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Filed by Atty Satorius.  Appointing Atty Dobbe. sm

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Walmart New Richmond WI.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.
Pre-trial/scheduling conference on October 27, 2022 at 08:30 am.

1:50 PM Apprs: CO: S. Needham, Rpr: V. Kasten, Clerk: B Harris, Defendant Kayla Jane Burdick in court, in custody.  Attorney Stephanie Kay Schmidt in court for Kayla Jane Burdick.  Prosecuting attorney Holly Elkin Rockow in court for the State of Wisconsin. Includes 22CM428 & 22CM434.  DE updates address.  DE didn't call PD office before hearing, Court requests DE to contact PD's office before leaving today.  For both cases- Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives reading.  NG.  Court orders bond and sets next hearing. Adjourned at 1:52 PM. bph
